org.apache.nutch.parse.rss.structs

Class RSSItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.parse.rss.structs.RSSItem

  • public class RSSItem
extends java.lang.Object

    Data class for holding RSS Items to send to Nutch's indexer

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    mattmann
